intro: Hieracium dentatum subsp. trefferianum, commonly known as the Treffer's hawkweed, is a flowering plant belonging to the family Asteraceae. It is characterized by its hairy, basal leaves and yellow composite flowers that bloom in summer. The plant typically grows in alpine and subalpine regions, preferring moist, rocky or grassy habitats. It is native to Europe and is often found in mountainous areas of the Alps and Carpathians. Due to its specific habitat requirements, it is considered a relatively rare and localized species.
